CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( AND(CONTAINS(Subject, 'MN'), AND(Day(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))>16, Day(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))<=22)), AND(NOT(CONTAINS(Subject, 'MN')), AND(Day(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))>11, Day(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))<=17))), 'on Bill Date', 'after Bill Day')
CustomField.label: Is Regeneration
